## ADD\_ADMIN\_MUTATION variable

This mutation is used to add the new admin for the organization.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ADD_ADMIN_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/member_mutations/removeMember.js)
